metadata.title: CVE-2024-25082 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Splinefont in FontForge through 20230101 allows command injection viacrafted archives or compressed files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-25082` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fontforge - 20120731.b-7.1ubuntu0.1+esm1
fontforge-common - 20120731.b-7.1ubuntu0.1+esm1
fontforge-nox - 20120731.b-7.1ubuntu0.1+esm1
libfontforge1 - 20120731.b-7.1ubuntu0.1+esm1
libgdraw4 - 20120731.b-7.1ubuntu0.1+esm1
python-fontforge - 20120731.b-7.1ubuntu0.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: fontforge package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20120731.b-7.1ubuntu0.1+esm1').
